summary: The site has some critical SEO issues that need to be addressed to improve visibility in search engines. Specifically, there are missing title tags and meta descriptions on key pages.

top_issues.why_it_matters: Title tags are essential for search engines to understand page content and for users to find relevant information.
top_issues.evidence: The page https://thenewslog.org/feed.xml is missing a title tag.

top_issues.why_it_matters: Meta descriptions help improve click-through rates from search results by providing a summary of the page.
top_issues.evidence: The page https://thenewslog.org/feed.xml is missing a meta description.

recommended_actions.action: Add title tags to all pages
Create meta descriptions for all pages
Implement a regular SEO review schedule

quick_wins: Add title tags to the feed page
Create a meta description for the feed page
Ensure all pages have unique titles and descriptions
